label: Automatic Cycling
description: Automatically cycle through wallpapers in the same folder

label: Blur Wallpaper Layer
description: Enable compositor-targetable blur layer (namespace: dms:blurwallpaper). Requires manual niri configuration.

label: Blur on Overview
description: Blur wallpaper when niri overview is open

label: Disable Built-in Wallpapers
description: Use an external wallpaper manager like swww, hyprpaper, or swaybg.

label: Duplicate Wallpaper with Blur
description: Enable compositor-targetable blur layer (namespace: dms:blurwallpaper). Requires manual niri configuration.

label: External Wallpaper Management
description: Use an external wallpaper manager like swww, hyprpaper, or swaybg.

label: Interval
description: How often to change wallpaper

label: Matugen Target Monitor
description: Monitor whose wallpaper drives dynamic theming colors

label: Per-Mode Wallpapers
description: Set different wallpapers for light and dark mode

label: Per-Monitor Wallpapers
description: Set different wallpapers for each connected monitor

label: Transition Effect
description: Visual effect used when wallpaper changes

label: Wallpaper
description: Set different wallpapers for light and dark mode

label: Wallpaper Monitor
description: Select monitor to configure wallpaper

label: 24-Hour Format
description: Use 24-hour time format instead of 12-hour AM/PM

label: Auto Location
description: Automatically determine your location using your IP address

label: Enable Weather
description: Show weather information in top bar and control center

label: Show Seconds
description: Display seconds in the clock

label: Time Format
description: Use 24-hour time format instead of 12-hour AM/PM

label: Use Imperial Units
description: Use Imperial units (°F, mph, inHg) instead of Metric (°C, km/h, hPa)

label: Weather
description: Show weather information in top bar and control center

label: Per-Monitor Workspaces
description: Show only workspaces belonging to each specific monitor.

label: Reverse Scrolling Direction
description: Reverse workspace switch direction when scrolling over the bar

label: Show All Tags
description: Show all 9 tags instead of only occupied tags (DWL only)

label: Show Occupied Workspaces Only
description: Display only workspaces that contain windows

label: Show Workspace Apps
description: Display application icons in workspace indicators

label: Workspace Index Numbers
description: Show workspace index numbers in the top bar workspace switcher

label: Group Workspace Apps
description: Display application icons in workspace indicators

label: Workspace Padding
description: Always show a minimum of 3 workspaces, even if fewer are available

label: Workspace Settings
description: Show workspace index numbers in the top bar workspace switcher

label: Auto-hide Dock
description: Hide the dock when not in use and reveal it when hovering near the dock area

label: Behavior
description: Only show windows from the current monitor on each dock

label: Border
description: Add a border around the dock

label: Dock Visibility
description: Display a dock with pinned and running applications

label: Group by App
description: Group multiple windows of the same app together with a window count indicator

label: Isolate Displays
description: Only show windows from the current monitor on each dock

label: Show Dock
description: Display a dock with pinned and running applications

label: Show on Overview
description: Always show the dock when niri

label: Enable Overview Overlay
description: Show launcher overlay when typing in Niri overview. Disable to use another launcher.

label: Grid Columns
description: Adjust the number of columns in grid view mode.

label: Niri Integration
description: Auto-close Niri overview when launching apps.

label: Sort Alphabetically
description: When enabled, apps are sorted alphabetically. When disabled, apps are sorted by usage frequency.

label: Sorting & Layout
description: When enabled, apps are sorted alphabetically. When disabled, apps are sorted by usage frequency.

label: Applications
description: Sync dark mode with settings portals for system-wide theme hints

label: Color Mode
description: Use light theme instead of dark theme

label: Corner Radius
description: 0 = square corners

label: Darken Modal Background
description: Show darkened overlay behind modal dialogs

label: Icon Theme
description: DankShell & System Icons (requires restart)

label: Light Mode
description: Use light theme instead of dark theme

label: Matugen Palette
description: Select the palette algorithm used for wallpaper-based colors

label: Modal Background
description: Show darkened overlay behind modal dialogs

label: Niri Layout Overrides
description: Use custom gaps instead of bar spacing

label: Override Corner Radius
description: Use custom window radius instead of theme radius

label: Override Gaps
description: Use custom gaps instead of bar spacing

label: Popup Transparency
description: Controls opacity of all popouts, modals, and their content layers

label: Sync Mode with Portal
description: Sync dark mode with settings portals for system-wide theme hints

label: Terminals - Always use Dark Theme
description: Force terminal applications to always use dark color schemes

label: Theme Color
description: Select the palette algorithm used for wallpaper-based colors

label: Widget Background Color
description: Choose the background color for widgets

label: Widget Style
description: Change bar appearance

label: Widget Styling
description: Change bar appearance

label: Window Corner Radius
description: Rounded corners for windows

label: Window Gaps
description: Space between windows

label: neovim
description: Requires lazy plugin manager

label: Enable fingerprint authentication
description: Use fingerprint reader for lock screen authentication (requires enrolled fingerprints)

label: Enable loginctl lock integration
description: Bind lock screen to dbus signals from loginctl. Disable if using an external lock screen

label: Lock Screen behaviour
description: Bind lock screen to dbus signals from loginctl. Disable if using an external lock screen

label: Lock Screen layout
description: If the field is hidden, it will appear as soon as a key is pressed.

label: Show Password Field
description: If the field is hidden, it will appear as soon as a key is pressed.

label: Animation Speed
description: Fine-tune animation timing in milliseconds

description: Fine-tune animation timing in milliseconds

description: Play sounds for system events

description: Note: this only changes the percentage, it does not actually limit charging.

description: Note: this only changes the percentage, it does not actually limit charging.

label: Fade to lock screen
description: Gradually fade the screen before locking with a configurable grace period

description: Require holding button/key to confirm power off, restart, suspend, hibernate and logout

label: Idle Settings
description: Gradually fade the screen before locking with a configurable grace period

label: Power Action Confirmation
description: Require holding button/key to confirm power off, restart, suspend, hibernate and logout

description: Display power menu actions in a grid instead of a list

description: Display power menu actions in a grid instead of a list

description: Clipboard works but nothing saved to disk
